snippet: The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts plans to disperse its cache of Andy Warhol’s work, including some unseen by the public, as it shifts to a focus on grants.
abstract: Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts plans to disperse its entire collection and shift almost exclusively into a grant-making organization; some of its artworks will be donated and some will be sold through an exclusive deal with Christie's.
lead_paragraph: The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts plans to disperse its cache of Andy Warhol’s work, including some unseen by the public, as it shifts to a focus on grants.

headline.main: Warhol Foundation Will Donate or Sell Its Whole Collection
headline.print_headline: Foundation Aims to Sell or Donate All Its Warhols

keywords.value: Warhol, Andy, Foundation for the Visual Arts
keywords.name: organizations
